title: Shadows of Lost Time: Stories
description: In this collection of short stories, Kanwarpreet Grewal brings fresh perspective to the shadows of the past, present and future. From historical figures such as Genghiz Khan, Plato and Lord Byron to the mysterious futuristic worlds of Zespian and Yoerzek, he covers an eclectic array of events, both real and imagined. These stories are exciting and philosophically profound and each one will arouse curiosity in the reader about the characters and events on which they are based.
author: Kanwarpreet Grewal
